summary: There was a time when I could have said yes, I have a favourite restaurant.  But these days, especially after covid hit and so many places closed during lockdown, no.  There's not one place I frequent often, or can say go here they serve the best food in town...
title: A Favourite Restaurant

feedTitle: CSS Tip: Learn CSS the easy way
summary:
Stop defining your variables inside :root. 
Use the @property instead and create "Typed CSS Variables"

Easy to debug using Dev tools
Implicit data validation
Can be animated if the type allows it
Available globally with a default value

Instead of doing this:
 Read more
title: Typed CSS variables using @property

summary:
Yesterday me and mine waited in not one queue, but 3 queues, in order to put in my paperwork for a passport.  I opted against sending via the post even registered, as they cannot guarantee it arriving (so why pay. )
I thought it was going to take all day...
title: A Passport to Travel
